alert.note: Alert for Clay; Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 08 at 7:41PM CDT until August 08 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLAY...WESTERN OTTER TAIL AND NORTHEASTERN WILKIN COUNTIES... At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Erhard, or 13 miles north of Fergus Falls, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fergus Falls, Pelican Rapids, Ottertail Lake, Lake Lida, Battle Lake, Rothsay and Underwood. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 27 and 65. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
